meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the March 4, 2024 Economic Development Committee Meeting Minutes and approval of the Special Called Joint Meeting of Economic Development Committee and Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee.

agenda_items.title: Development Services Monthly Technology and Metrics
agenda_items.description: Briefing on the monthly technology and metrics from Development Services.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Public Improvement District (PID) Agenda Items
agenda_items.description: Call for Public Hearing to be held on May 22, 2024 to renew the North Lake Highland PID, Prestonwood PID and expand the Dallas Tourism PID to include 1 additional hotel.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Development Fund Replacement Board Members
agenda_items.description: Discussion on upcoming agenda item regarding replacement board members for the Dallas Development Fund.
